ygData.subject: Re: Blue Plate Mail
ygData.msgSnippet: Awww Cmon, d ya know how screwed Medium Races got on Bronze Armor?  Hahahah the one sub-30 lvl guy that s reasonable to kill for medium bronze drops a piece of
ygData.messageBody:
Awww Cmon, d'ya know how screwed Medium Races got on Bronze Armor? Hahahah
the one sub-30 lvl guy that's reasonable to kill for medium bronze drops a
piece of medium less then she drops the Jboots!

And it is Medium Sized only. . .I know there have been rumors that the size
is dependent on the person making the armor; not so...the gnome wizard in my
group looted the werewolf claw on accident, not knowing it was no-drop. He
had to make the armor, and it still came out medium size only.

Also, whoever said they had 3 helms...kinda doubtful since they are lore
items. Large bronze is rather easy to come by though, it's an always drop
from near the same place as the above comment, so barbarians are lucky.

Tybault Montague
lvl 32 Half-Elf Warrior
Prexus Server


>From: J Eric Rowland <gemini68@...>

>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Blue Plate Mail
>Date: Sat, 24 Jul 1999 06:44:31 -0600
>
>From: J Eric Rowland <gemini68@...>
>
>Yeah, Once again us dwarven warriors get to bend over and take it. We don't
>get
>slam, and now we don't get this new armor either. But, hey, we do have a
>really
>cool jump animation! We do that awesome tuck-and-roll when we jump! WOW!
>That's
>worth something isn't it? Isn't it? *Laughs bitterly*
>
>

>
> > From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
> >
> > Barbarian warriors can wear the armor as well because they can wear
>medium

>Trolls

> >
